execution_plan.description: Compute the mean (average) product price across all products.
execution_plan.query: SELECT AVG(product_price) AS mean_price FROM Products;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve the prices and sizes of products whose price is greater than the mean price computed in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_price, product_size FROM Products WHERE product_price > $step1.mean_price;
